param.name: templatebyText
param.label: 'Template By' Text
param.description: This is copyright text at bottom: 'Template By'

param.name: templatebyName
param.label: Template Author Name Text
param.description: This is template author name copyright text at bottom: 'JoomForest'

param.name: templatebyLink
param.label: Template Author Link
param.description: This is template author copyright link at bottom: 'http://www.joomforest.com'

param.name: avatarSizeXThumb
param.label: Avatar Max Size-X Thumb
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-X Thumb' in pixels (Default is - 36). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: avatarSizeYThumb
param.label: Avatar Max Size-Y Thumb
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-Y Thumb' in pixels (Default is - 36). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: avatarSizeXWelcome
param.label: Avatar Max Size-X Welcome
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-X Welcome' in pixels (Default is - 72). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: avatarSizeYWelcome
param.label: Avatar Max Size-Y Welcome
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-Y Welcome' in pixels (Default is - 72). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: avatarSizeXList
param.label: Avatar Max Size-X List
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-X List' in pixels (Default is - 36). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: avatarSizeYList
param.label: Avatar Max Size-Y List
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-Y List' in pixels (Default is - 36). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: avatarSizeXPost
param.label: Avatar Max Size-X Post
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-X Post' in pixels (Default is - 144). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: avatarSizeYPost
param.label: Avatar Max Size-Y Post
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-Y Post' in pixels (Default is - 144). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: avatarSizeXProfile
param.label: Avatar Max Size-X Profile
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-X Profile' in pixels (Default is - 200). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: avatarSizeYProfile
param.label: Avatar Max Size-Y Profile
param.description: Set avatar maximum 'Size-Y Profile' in pixels (Default is - 200). NOTE! If you dont know what you are doing, dont change it.

param.name: jfkujQuery
param.label: jQuery Library
param.description: If you dont use jQuery library on your website, than enable it. (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' joomla template and our 'JF Library' plugin, you don't need to enable it.)

param.name: jfkujQuerynoConflict
param.label: jQuery noConflict Mode
param.description: If you dont use jQuery 'noConflict' mode on your website, than enable it. (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' joomla template and our 'JF Library' plugin, you don't need to enable it.)

param.name: jfkujQueryEasing
param.label: jQuery Easing Feature
param.description: If you dont use jQuery 'Easing' feature (http://gsgd.co.uk/sandbox/jquery/easing/) on your website, than enable it. (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' joomla template and if you have enabled 'Easing' feature there, you don't need to enable it.)

param.name: jfkujQueryTipsy
param.label: jQuery Tipsy Tooltip
param.description: If you dont use jQuery 'Tipsy Tooltip' feature (http://onehackoranother.com/projects/jquery/tipsy/) on your website, than enable it. (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' Joomla template and if you have enabled 'Tipsy Tooltip' feature there, you don't need to enable it here.)

param.name: jfkuGoogleWebFont
param.label: Google Web Font Library
param.description: Enable of not 'Google Font Library' on your website

param.name: jfkuGoogleFontSheet
param.label: Type Google Font Stylesheet
param.description: Type Google Font Stylesheet (Default is - '//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Yanone+Kaffeesatz'). For other fonts visit - http://www.google.com/webfonts (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to add Google font StyleSheet)

param.name: jfkuGoogleFontFace
param.label: Type Google Font Face
param.description: Type Google Font Face (Default is - Yanone Kaffeesatz). For other fonts visit - http://www.google.com/webfonts

param.name: jfku_JFlogo
param.label: JF Logo
param.description: Enable of not 'JF Logo' feature on your website at bottom

param.name: jfku_JFlogoLink
param.label: Type 'JF Logo' Link
param.description: Type 'JF Logo' Link (Default is - 'http://www.joomforest.com')

param.name: jfku_JFlogoTitle
param.label: Type 'JF Logo' Title
param.description: Type 'JF Logo' Title (Default is - 'www.JoomForest.com')

param.name: jfku_UnlimColors
param.label: 'Unlimited Colors' Feature
param.description: Enable of not 'Unlimited Colors' feature on your website (NOTE! - If you use our 'JF Social' Joomla Template, than dont enable it here, and use it in Joomla Template Manager. Also make sure if you have enabled 'Kunena Theme Color Override' There)

param.name: jfku_UC_MainActive
param.label: Main Active Color
param.description: Choose Main Active Color (it contains all links, Menu Active Item color and so on...) | (Default is - '#2a7b99')

param.name: jfku_UC_MainInactive
param.label: Main Inactive Color
param.description: Choose Main Inactive Color (it contains for example, 'cancel' button color ...) | (Default is - '#DD0000')

param.name: jfku_UC_MobileT_gr_t
param.label: Mobile Toolbar Gradient - Top
param.description: Choose Mobile Toolbar Top Gradient Color | (Default is - '#227FA3')

param.name: jfku_UC_MobileT_gr_b
param.label: Mobile Toolbar Gradient - Bottom
param.description: Choose Mobile Toolbar Bottom Gradient Color | (Default is - '#194B5E')

param.name: jfku_FontSize
param.label: 'Font Size Changer' Feature
param.description: Enable of not 'Font Size Changer' feature on your website

param.name: jfku_FS_Menu
param.label: Menu Font Size
param.description: Type Menu Font Size (Default is - '18px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Cat_H
param.label: Category Header Font Size
param.description: Type Category Header Font Size (Default is - '22px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_SideBar_M_T
param.label: SideBar Modules Title Font Size
param.description: Type SideBar Modules Title Font Size (Default is - '18px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_H_Search
param.label: Header Search Font Size
param.description: Type Header Search Font Size (Default is - '16px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_K_Login
param.label: Kunena Login Font Size
param.description: Type Kunena Login Font Size (Default is - '16px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_K_Login_L
param.label: Kunena Login 'Logout' Font Size
param.description: Type Kunena Login 'Logout' Font Size (Default is - '15px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_JF_Popup_H
param.label: JF Popup Header Title Font Size
param.description: Type JF Popup Header Title Font Size (Default is - '22px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Tipsy
param.label: Tipsy Tooltip Font Size
param.description: Type Tipsy Tooltip Font Size (Default is - '16px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Topic_Status
param.label: Topic Status Font Size
param.description: Type Topic Status Font Size (Default is - '14px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Select_Tag
param.label: Select Tag Font Size
param.description: Type Select Tag Font Size (Default is - '16px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Select_Tag_L
param.label: Select Tag LetterSpacing Font Size
param.description: Type Select Tag LetterSpacing Font Size (Default is - '1px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Input_Btn
param.label: Input Button Font Size
param.description: Type Input Button Font Size (Default is - '16px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_K_Jump_Btn
param.label: Kunena Jump button Font Size
param.description: Type Kunena Jump button Font Size (Default is - '18px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Profile_Btns
param.label: Profile Buttons Font Size
param.description: Type Profile Buttons Font Size (Default is - '18px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Profile_Edit
param.label: Profile Edit Button Font Size
param.description: Type Profile Edit Button Font Size (Default is - '23px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Mob_T_Big_Txt
param.label: Mobile Toolbar Big Text Font Size
param.description: Type Mobile Toolbar Big Text Font Size (Default is - '24px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Mob_T_Small_T
param.label: Mobile Toolbar Small Text Font Size
param.description: Type Mobile Toolbar Small Text Font Size (Default is - '16px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Mob_T_Btns
param.label: Mobile Toolbar Buttons Font Size
param.description: Type Mobile Toolbar Buttons Font Size (Default is - '25px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfku_FS_Mob_T_Menu
param.label: Mobile Toolbar Menu Font Size
param.description: Type Mobile Toolbar Menu Font Size (Default is - '24px') | (NOTE! - Leave it Empty if you dont want to use)

param.name: jfkuSideBar
param.label: SideBar Module Position
param.description: Enable/Disable Sidebar Module Position

param.name: jfkuSideBarStatus
param.label: SideBar Module Position: Status
param.description: Make Opened or Closed SideBar on first Startup

param.name: jfkuSideBarToggleBtn
param.label: SideBar Module Position: Toggle (Button)
param.description: Enable/Disable SideBar Module Position Toggle (Button)

param.name: jfkuSideBarToggleMod
param.label: SideBar Module Position: Toggle Modules
param.description: Enable/Disable SideBar Module Position Toggle Modules

param.name: jfkuSideBarToggleStatus
param.label: SideBar Module Position: Toggle Modules - Status
param.description: Make Opened or Closed SideBar Module Position Modules

param.name: jfkuStickyHeader
param.label: Sticky Header Feature
param.description: Enable/Disable Sticky Header Feature

param.name: jfkuQuickNavPos
param.label: QuickNavigation Module Position - 'jf_kunena_quicknav'
param.description: Enable/Disable QuickNavigation Module Position - 'jf_kunena_quicknav'

param.name: jfkuQ_N_ModalMinH
param.label: Modal Minimum Height
param.description: Type QuickNavigation Modal Minimum Height (Default is - '350px')

param.name: jfkuQ_N_ModalMaxH
param.label: Modal Maximum Height
param.description: Type QuickNavigation Modal Maximum Height (Default is - '350px')

param.name: jfkuQ_N_ModalMenuSubH
param.label: Modal Menu SubItems Minimum Height
param.description: Type QuickNavigation Modal Menu SubItems Minimum Height (Default is - '145%')

param.name: jfkuLoginPos
param.label: Kunena Login Module Position - 'jf_kunena_login'
param.description: Enable/Disable Kunena Login Module Position - 'jf_kunena_login'

param.name: jfkuAnnouncements
param.label: Kunena Annoucements Button
param.description: Enable/Disable Kunena Annoucements Button (NOTE! - This button is shown only for Moderators)

param.name: jfkuSearchPos
param.label: Kunena Search Module Position - 'jf_kunena_search'
param.description: Enable/Disable Kunena Search Module Position - 'jf_kunena_search'

param.name: jfkuMobileToolbar
param.label: Kunena Mobile Toolbar
param.description: Enable/Disable Kunena Mobile Toolbar
